debug.canvas.missing_uniform: Canvas unable to find uniform %s in shaders %s, %s. This is normal if the uniform isn't used in the shader.
warn.canvas.slow_gl_call: Canvas unable to obtain a fast call path to %s due to reflection error. Render performance may be reduced.
error.canvas.fail_create_shader: Canvas unable to create shader %s with property index %d due to unexpected error: %s.
error.canvas.fail_create_any_shader: Canvas unable to create one or more shaders due to compilation errors. See canvas_shader_debug folder for details.
error.canvas.program_link_failure: Canvas unable to create linked shader due to unexpected error.
error.canvas.fail_create_lightmap:
Canvas unable to create HD lightmap(s) - out of space. 
Some blocks will not render with proper lighting. 
Reduce view distance or disable HD lightmaps. F3+A will temporarily clear this problem.
config.canvas.title: Canvas Renderer Configuration
config.canvas.help.item_render: Applies material properties;and shaders to items.;Mostly works but not complete.
config.canvas.help.subtle_fog: Makes terrain fog a;little less foggy.
config.canvas.help.light_smoothing: Makes light sources less cross-shaped.;Chunk loading a little slower.;Overall light levels remain similar.
config.canvas.help.hd_lightmaps: Prevents banding at block boundaries.;Some impact to memeory use,;chunk loading and frame rate.
config.canvas.help.subtle_ao: Ambient Occlusion shading is;less heavy for block light.
config.canvas.help.chunk_occlusion: Helps with chunk rebuild;and also rendering when; player is moving or;many blocks update.
config.canvas.help.batch_chunk_render: Draws multiple chunks with;same view transformation.;Much faster, but try without;if you see visual defects.
config.canvas.help.adjust_vanilla_geomet: Adjusts quads on some vanilla; models (like iron bars) to avoid;z-fighting with neighbor blocks.
config.canvas.help.shader_debug: Output runtime per-material shader source.;For shader development debugging.
config.canvas.help.concise_errors: Summarizes multiple errors and warnings to single-line entries in the log.
config.canvas.help.log_machine_info: Writes information useful for bug;reports to the game log.
